thread.title: Kenya Airways May Need USD$600 Mln Bailout
thread.title_full: Kenya Airways May Need USD$600 Mln Bailout | Airwise News

author: Reuters
title: Kenya Airways May Need USD$600 Mln Bailout
text:
Kenya Airways, which reported a record loss in its year ended March, may require a USD$500 million - USD$600 million bailout, the Kenyan finance minister said. Henry Rotich said the final figures and the form of recapitalisation would depend on a turnaround plan being prepared by McKinsey and Seabury consultants, who were hired by the airline.
(Reuters)
